name: BFSTM Audio Stream
summary: Learn about .BFSTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A BFSTM file is an audio file saved in the Binary caFe STreaM (BFSTM) format used by various Nintendo Wii U and Switch games. It may contain a sound effect or background music that is looped during gameplay. BFSTM files replaced .BRSTM and .BCSTM files, which are commonly used by Wii and 3DS games.

instructions: BFSTM files can be opened on a PC using BrawlBox, which can also convert them to .WAV files. The files can also be opened using the VGAudio library.
